title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Plan a flight using MSFS 2020's built in planner
description:
In this video I will show you how you can plan a flight including selecting a departure and approach by using the built-in planner from Flight Simulator 2020.
We will depart from Amsterdam Schiphol Airport (EHAM) and will plan a flight to Kennedy International Airport (KJFK) in New York.
Once the main flight is planned we will look at the effect of changing the departure route (SID) and selecting a terminal approach route (STAR). As last point we will look at the nav log and how you can use it.
